displayProperties.name: Commander Zavala
displayProperties.description: The resolute Commander Zavala advises Guardians on all Vanguard-related activities.

displayProperties.name: The Drifter
displayProperties.description: The name says it all.

displayProperties.name: Ada-1
displayProperties.description: Advanced Prototype Exo and warden of the Black Armory.

displayProperties.name: Dendrite Shimmer Hunter Bundle
displayProperties.description:
Contains a full set of Dawning 2021 Hunter universal ornaments.

Bundle price reduced for each item you already own.

displayProperties.name: Lunar New Year Bundle
displayProperties.description:
Contains 3 Lunar New Year accessories.

Bundle price will be reduced for each item already owned.

displayProperties.name: Amanda Holliday
displayProperties.description: Shipwright to the Tower, Amanda Holliday runs the Hangar like a finely tuned engine.

displayProperties.name: Banshee-44
displayProperties.description: Banshee-44 has lived many lives. As master weaponsmith for the Tower, he supplies Guardians with only the best.

displayProperties.name: Saint-14
displayProperties.description: A legendary hero and the former Titan Vanguard, Saint-14 disappeared into the Infinite Forest only to be later rescued by a fellow Guardian.

displayProperties.name: Spider
displayProperties.description: Unlike his Fallen brethren, the clever Spider prefers to negotiate instead of fight.

displayProperties.name: Exotic Weapons
displayProperties.description: This engram may contain Exotic weapons.

displayProperties.name: Lord Saladin
displayProperties.description: Lord Saladin, the last surviving Iron Lord, oversees the Iron Banner event: trial by combat where only the strongest survive.

displayProperties.name: Eva Levante
displayProperties.description: No longer an outfitter for heroes of the Tower, Eva now devotes her time to making sure Guardians enjoy seasonal events.

displayProperties.name: Exotic Engram
displayProperties.description:
An engram with a predestined outcome.

Contains a new Exotic if any of the possible rewards remain to be collected. Preview contents for possible rewards.

displayProperties.name: Brute Force Accessories Bundle
displayProperties.description:
Contains 3 themed accessories.

Bundle price will be reduced for each item already owned.

displayProperties.name: M3-D1 Accessory Bundle
displayProperties.description:
Contains 3 M3-D1 accessories.

Bundle price will be reduced for each item already owned.

displayProperties.name: Petra Venj
displayProperties.description: A warrior of the Reef, Petra Venj puts duty above all else.

displayProperties.name: Streetwear Warlock Bundle
displayProperties.description: Contains a full set of Streetwear Warlock universal ornaments.

displayProperties.name: Shaw Han
displayProperties.description: A skilled Hunter, Shaw leads fireteams on dangerous missions throughout the solar system.

displayProperties.name: Petra Venj
displayProperties.description: A warrior of the Reef, Petra Venj puts duty above all else.

displayProperties.name: Seasonal
displayProperties.description: Quests related to Seasons.

displayProperties.name: Ikora Rey
displayProperties.description: The wise Ikora Rey aids and advises Guardians in the protection of humanity and beyond.

displayProperties.name: Dendrite Shimmer Warlock Bundle
displayProperties.description:
Contains a full set of Dawning 2021 Warlock universal ornaments.

Bundle price reduced for each item you already own.

displayProperties.name: Xûr
displayProperties.description: A peddler of strange curios, Xûr's motives are not his own. He bows to his distant masters, the Nine.

displayProperties.name: Master Rahool
displayProperties.description: A senior representative of the Cryptarchy, Master Rahool decodes engrams and seeks the treasures of humanity's past.

displayProperties.name: Exotic
displayProperties.description: Quests related to Exotic gear.

displayProperties.name: Ada-1
displayProperties.description: Ada-1, curator of the mysterious Black Armory, is torn between upholding tradition and adapting to an ever-changing world.

displayProperties.name: The Crow
displayProperties.description: The amnesiac Lightbearer once known as Prince Uldren Sov of the Reef.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Traveler Accessories Bundle
displayProperties.description:
Contains 3 themed accessories.

Bundle price will be reduced for each item already owned.

displayProperties.name: Forsaken Exotics
displayProperties.description: Exotics released during Destiny 2 - Year 2.

displayProperties.name: Tess Everis
displayProperties.description: Tess Everis is an accomplished broker of stylish and highly coveted items procured from the City and beyond.

displayProperties.name: Starhorse
displayProperties.description: A mysterious, impossible horse. Starhorse's origins and motives are unknowable.

displayProperties.name: Xûr
displayProperties.description: A mysterious being who is servant to forces greater than himself.

displayProperties.name: Resplendent Reward Package
displayProperties.description: Contains a curated selection of rewards from Xûr.

displayProperties.name: Quest Archive
displayProperties.description: Kiosk to acquire old or abandoned quests.

displayProperties.name: 30th Anniversary Starter Pack
displayProperties.description:
A one-time bundle to kick off the 30th Anniversary.

Contains 3 exclusive items and 3 Armor Synthesis tokens.

displayProperties.name: Lord Shaxx
displayProperties.description: The Crucible is the arena in which Guardians forge their Light. Lord Shaxx is the Crucible.

displayProperties.name: Queen Mara Sov
displayProperties.description: The stately and inscrutable ruler of the Reef.

displayProperties.name: Exotic Engram
displayProperties.description: An engram with remarkable encoding markers. A Cryptarch would be thrilled to decode this to reveal its true nature.

displayProperties.description: Quests related to campaigns.

displayProperties.name: Exo Stranger
displayProperties.description: Burdened with the knowledge one can only gain from time travel, the Stranger is here to divert us from an inescapable dark future.
